AT.name: Goosebumps: The Game
AT.description: The walk home from school today is going to be a lot spookier than usual… Your sleepy neighborhood’s been overrun by monsters! Werewolves prowl the woods, Gnomes roam underfoot, and scarecrows walk at midnight. But these aren’t ordinary monsters - they’re R.L. Stine’s famous Goosebumps monsters, released from their books and looking to wreak havoc! You’ll need to use your wits to investigate the surroundings, puzzle out clues, and outsmart the monsters before it’s too late! Survive a trek through your neighborhood, unravel the mysteries of the Dead House, and sneak through the mall after hours; only then can you confront Slappy and stop his plans for revenge!

BE.name: Goosebumps : The Game
BE.description: Aujourd’hui, rentrer de l’école sera beaucoup plus effrayant que d'habitude... Votre quartier jusqu'alors endormi a été envahi par des monstres ! Des loups-garous arpentent les bois, des gnomes grouillent à vos pieds et des épouvantails rôdent dès minuit. Attention, il ne s’agit pas là de monstres ordinaires, mais bien des célèbres monstres de Chair de poule de R.L. Stine, sortis des livres pour tout mettre à feu et à sang ! Vous devrez faire preuve de présence d'esprit pour enquêter dans les environs, dénicher des indices et vous montrer plus malin que les monstres avant qu'il ne soit trop tard ! Traversez votre quartier sans trépasser, découvrez les mystères de la maison des morts et faufilez-vous à travers le centre commercial après sa fermeture ; alors seulement pourrez-vous affronter Slappy et mettre un terme à ses plans de vengeance !

You’ll need to use your wits to investigate the surroundings, puzzle out clues, and outsmart the monsters before it’s too late! Survive a trek through your neighborhood, unravel the mysteries of the Dead House, and sneak through the mall after hours; only then can you confront Slappy and stop his plans for revenge!

ES.name: Goosebumps: The Game
ES.description: Hoy el camino a casa va a ser más espeluznante de lo habitual... ¡Tu adormecido vecindario está infestado de monstruos! Hombres lobo merodean los bosques, gnomos deambulan por mitad de la calle, y los espantapájaros caminan a medianoche. Pero estos no son monstruos ordinarios... son los famosos monstruos de R. L. Stine, que han sido liberados de sus libros y pretenden causar el caos. Tendrás que usar tu ingenio para investigar los alredores, resolver pistas y engañar a los monstruos antes de que sea demasiado tarde. Sobrevive a un largo viaje por el vecindario. Resuelve los misterios de la Casa Encantada y cuélate a hurtadillas en el centro comercial de noche; ¡solo entonces podrás enfrentarte a Slappy y detener sus planes de venganza!

You’ll need to use your wits to investigate the surroundings, puzzle out clues, and outsmart the monsters before it’s too late! Survive a trek through your neighborhood, unravel the mysteries of the Dead House, and sneak through the mall after hours; only then can you confront Slappy and stop his plans for revenge!

IT.name: Goosebumps: The Game
IT.description: Oggi tornare a casa da scuola sarà molto più spaventoso del solito... Il tuo noioso quartiere è stato invaso dai mostri! Dei lupi mannari si aggirano per i boschi, gli gnomi ti saltellano fra i piedi e a mezzanotte gli spaventapasseri prendono vita. Ma questi non sono mostri qualsiasi, sono le creature dei famosi Piccoli brividi di R.L. Stine che hanno abbandonato i libri per seminare il panico! Dovrai sfruttare tutto il tuo ingegno per indagare nei vari ambienti, decifrare gli indizi e dimostrarti più in gamba dei mostri prima che sia troppo tardi! Sopravvivi a una passeggiata per il tuo quartiere, svela i misteri della casa della morte e intrufolati nel centro commerciale dopo l'orario di chiusura: solo allora potrai affrontare Slappy e mandare all'aria i suoi piani di vendetta!

Werewolves prowl the woods, Gnomes roam underfoot, and scarecrows walk at midnight. But these aren’t ordinary monsters - they’re R.L. Stine’s famous Goosebumps monsters, released from their books and looking to wreak havoc! You’ll need to use your wits to investigate the surroundings, puzzle out clues, and outsmart the monsters before it’s too late! Survive a trek through your neighborhood, unravel the mysteries of the Dead House, and sneak through the mall after hours; only then can you confront Slappy and stop his plans for revenge!

NL.name: Goosebumps: The Game
NL.description: De wandeling van school naar huis zal vandaag heel wat enger zijn dan normaal... Je wijk, waar haast nooit iets gebeurt, wordt overspoeld door monsters! Weerwolven huilen in het woud, trollen kruipen onder de grond en vogelverschrikkers komen om middernacht tot leven. Maar dit zijn geen normale monsters: het zijn de bekende Kippenvel-monsters van R.L. Stine. Ze komen recht uit het boek om chaos te veroorzaken! Je moet je verstand gebruiken om de omgeving te onderzoeken, raadsels op te lossen voor aanwijzingen en de monsters te slim af te zijn voor het te laat is! Overleef de tocht naar huis, ontrafel het mysterie van het Dodenhuis en sluip na openingstijd het winkelcentrum in. Alleen dan kun je Slappy confronteren en een stokje steken voor zijn wraakplannen!

NZ.name: Goosebumps: The Game
NZ.description: The walk home from school today is going to be a lot spookier than usual… Your sleepy neighborhood’s been overrun by monsters! Werewolves prowl the woods, Gnomes roam underfoot, and scarecrows walk at midnight. But these aren’t ordinary monsters - they’re R.L. Stine’s famous Goosebumps monsters, released from their books and looking to wreak havoc! You’ll need to use your wits to investigate the surroundings, puzzle out clues, and outsmart the monsters before it’s too late! PL.name: Goosebumps: The Game
PL.description: The walk home from school today is going to be a lot spookier than usual… Your sleepy neighborhood’s been overrun by monsters! Werewolves prowl the woods, Gnomes roam underfoot, and scarecrows walk at midnight. But these aren’t ordinary monsters - they’re R.L. Stine’s famous Goosebumps monsters, released from their books and looking to wreak havoc! You’ll need to use your wits to investigate the surroundings, puzzle out clues, and outsmart the monsters before it’s too late! Survive a trek through your neighborhood, unravel the mysteries of the Dead House, and sneak through the mall after hours; only then can you confront Slappy and stop his plans for revenge!

PT.name: Goosebumps: The Game
PT.description: Hoje, o caminho da escola para casa vai ser muito mais arrepiante do que o habitual… O seu bairro pacato foi invadido por monstros! Lobisomens vagueiam pelos bosques em busca de presas, gnomos perambulam debaixo dos pés e espantalhos desatam a caminhar à meia-noite. Mas esses não são monstros comuns: trata-se dos famosos monstros de Goosebumps de R. L. Stine que se libertaram dos livros e querem semear a destruição! Você terá que usar a inteligência para investigar os arredores, descobrir pistas e ser mais esperto do que os monstros antes que seja tarde demais! Sobreviva a uma caminhada pelo seu bairro, decifre os mistérios da Casa dos Mortos e esgueire-se até ao centro comercial depois de fechar - só então você confrontará Slappy e para deter os seus planos de vingança!

RU.name: Goosebumps: The Game
RU.description: Сегодня идти из школы домой будет страшнее, чем обычно... На тихий район напали монстры! В лесу бродят оборотни. Под ногами путаются гномы. А в полночь выходят пугала. Но это не обычные монстры. Они из знаменитой серии книг Р. Л. Стайна "Мурашки" (Goosebumps). Сойдя со страниц книг, они намерены сеять хаос! Исследуйте окружение с умом, находите ключи и будьте умнее монстров, не то вам не поздоровится! Пройдите через весь район, раскройте тайны Мертвого дома и прокрадитесь через закрытый торговый центр. Только после этого вы сможете вступить в борьбу с Болванчиком и помешать ему отомстить!

SE.name: Goosebumps: The Game
SE.description: The walk home from school today is going to be a lot spookier than usual… Your sleepy neighborhood’s been overrun by monsters!
